Package com.cmpt213.gameLogic

Class Spell

java.lang.Object
com.cmpt213.gameLogic.Spell
public class Spell extends Object
The `Spell` class represents the spells that the player can use in the Tokimon finder game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Spell()
    Constructs a `Spell` object and initializes the random number generator.

    Sets the remaining number of spells that the player can use.
    static void
    useSpell(int spellNumber, GameGrid gameGrid, Spell spell)

  • Constructor Details

    • Spell

      public Spell()
      Constructs a `Spell` object and initializes the random number generator.

  • Method Details

    • useSpell

      public static void useSpell(int spellNumber, GameGrid gameGrid, Spell spell)
      Uses a spell based on the specified spell number to interact with the game grid.
      Parameters:
      spellNumber - The number representing the type of spell to use: 1 for Tokimon spell, 2 for Fokimon spell, or 3 for Teleportation spell.
      gameGrid - The `GameGrid` object representing the game grid.
      spell - The `Spell` object to use for the spell.

    • getRemainingSpells

      public int getRemainingSpells()
      Retrieves the number of remaining spells that the player can use.
      Returns:
      The remaining number of spells.

    • setRemainingSpells

      public void setRemainingSpells(int spellsNum)
      Sets the remaining number of spells that the player can use.
      Parameters:
      spellsNum - The number of spells to set as remaining.
